question: What are the most frequently discussed topics in LinkedIn posts from data science leaders in companies that adopted cloud services in the last year?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that adopted cloud services in the last year. [CompanyTechStack]
Retrieve LinkedIn posts from data science leaders in those companies. [PersonaLinkedinPost, PersonaTitle]
Analyze the posts to find the most frequently discussed topics. [PersonaLinkedinPost]
